title: Hindustan Unilever 2Q Net Profit Rose 21%
text:
By Saurabh Chaturvedi

Hindustan Unilever Ltd. (500696.BY) reported a 21% increase in net profit for the fiscal second quarter, helped by higher sales.

Net profit for the quarter ended September was 18.48 billion rupees ($260.6 million), compared with INR15.25 billion in the same period a year ago, the consumer-goods company said Monday.

Total income rose to INR100.32 billion from INR95.39 billion, the company said.

Write to Saurabh Chaturvedi at saurabh.chaturvedi@wsj.com

(END) Dow Jones Newswires

October 14, 2019 07:10 ET (11:10 GMT)
